name: The Inspector
description:
You are a detective and you have to find the clues around the map and inside of the houses in order to discover the guilty.

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Interact with E
  • Z to accuse an entity when you have found all the clues
  • L to toggle the letter
  • A to analyze a clue in your inventory
  • Arrow keys and ENTER to move items in inventories
  • Q to drop items from your inventory
  • M to toggle the map
  • X to see all the suspects and their location

Code & art G3Dev

For more informations and installation instructions join the Discord server here!
